game

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Character
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    game.ICharacter

    public class Character
extends java.lang.Object
implements game.ICharacter
    Character class defines the attack and defense strength of a character created, it also holds the lift of gears/items the character is wearing, characters will be able to enhance their basic abilities by "wearing" different items.

      Constructs a Character in terms of its name, attack and defense strengths.
